main event: A hovering object with six lights was observed for 30 seconds in Hawthorne, Nevada on April 9, 1963.
interesting points: The object was 2-3 feet in diameter and hovered at an altitude of 30 feet.
The object made a quick up and down burst and a buzzing sound.
The object then sped up, emitted a reddish glow, and suddenly disappeared in a flash for 3 seconds.
The incident was classified as a meteor sighting.
Other sightings of similar objects were reported in the area.
sighted object: A 2-3 foot diameter hovering object with six lights
